Freaks & Geeks DVD Arrived: Best DVD Evah!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2004 Topics (Year of the Venture): Freaks & Geeks DVD Arrived: Best DVD Evah!
By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, March 31, 2004 - 01:28 pm:

I just got my limited edition Freaks & Geeks DVD set, in the yearbook case, and it is, without question, the best DVD set ever made. Not only is the show great, they added 2 commentary tracks for each show, plus a ton of extras! The limited edition set has 8 discs (as opposed to the retail set's 6) and is bound inside of a real yearbook with tons of pictures, essays, background information and a lot more. It's like having a deluxe coffee-table book plus a DVD set.

The regular retail version will still be cool, it's in stores on Tuesday. It will still have the 2 commentary tracks per episode, plus exras. It just won't have the big yearbook, and some bonus materials like all of the cast auditions.

Go buy or rent this! The show was great.
